title: Trail Of Tears National Historic Trail: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park       Partner with the Trail  You can help to ensure the legacy of the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail, the integrity of the resources, and the untold stories of our American heritage by partnering with the trail. There are several ways in which you can participate:  Join a trail association  Enter into a partnership certification agreement  Visit museums, visitor centers, and resources on-the-ground along the trail    ENJOY YOUR NATIONAL HISTORIC TRAIL!
